metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9113 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: There is a NULL pointer dereference in function imagetobmp of convertbmp.c:980 of OpenJPEG 2.1.2. image->comps[0].data is not assigned a value after initialization(NULL). Impact is Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-1').
